name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. âœ¨

content.html:
I think it is a mistake to tie career ladders to years of experience, and that instead they should be defined by the scope and scale of projects someone is able to execute independently on. Years of experience are meaningless, demonstrated competence is all that matters.
twitter.com/lanooba/statusâ€¦
content.value:
I think it is a mistake to tie career ladders to years of experience, and that instead they should be defined by the scope and scale of projects someone is able to execute independently on.

Years of experience are meaningless, demonstrated competence is all that matters.
